com.client.core.base.service.transaction.impl

Class StandardTransactionService<T extends JpaEntity<PK>,PK>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.client.core.base.service.transaction.impl.StandardTransactionService<T,PK>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of entity which we will be interacting with the DAO with
    PK - the id of the entity which we will be interacting with the DAO with
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionService<T,PK>

    public class StandardTransactionService<T extends JpaEntity<PK>,PK>
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransactionService<T,PK>
    Service used to wrap DAO calls with @Transactional annotations so as to handle the transaction in a generic way. Do NOT wrap any call to a TransactionService in a @Transactional annotation. The passed in DAO is used for all database calls and defines what type of entity can be retrieved/inserted into the database.
